articles.author: HT Tech
articles.title: Google launches crackdown, takes down domains tied to CryptBot malware - HT Tech
articles.description: Google will take down current and future domains that are tied to the distribution of CryptBot malware, which is targeting users of Google Chrome.
articles.content: Even as awareness is raised about spread of cyber crime, hackers keep coming up with different ideas to steal data and money from people. Crackdowns have come frequently and Google has been an active… [+2564 chars]

articles.title: UltraTech Cement Q4 result: Firm declared dividend, check details here | Mint - Mint
articles.description: UltraTech Cement on Friday reported a a decline of 32.29 per cent in consolidated net profit to  ₹1,665.95 crore for the March quarte
articles.content: UltraTech Cement on Friday said that its board of directors at their meeting have recommended a dividend at the rate of Rs. 38 per equity share. "Board of Directors of the Company {"the Board") to be… [+1922 chars]
